price: 99. Waxaana lagu raacshay Nacalad (duni) tani gudaheeda iyo Maalinta Qiyaamaha24, xumaa waxa loo kordhin (oo Cadho Alle iyo Cadaab ah).
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ
footnotes: 24. Waa lacnad ku raaceysa adduun iyo aakhiro labada daaroodba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati bi'sa al-rif'du al-marfūdu
